version_description: Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Welcome back to school. We're excited you're here! We've built new tools to make practicing more fun, and have added assignments.

- Stuck on a problem? You can now skip it and continue practicing
- We've added assignments- your teacher or coach can now assign you work to complete on your phone
- We show your progress on exercises throughout the app so that you can practice and keep growing.
- Our exercises got a fresh coat of paint

Want to learn more about using Khan Academy assignments in your classroom? Check out khanacademy.org/resources

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Assignments on iPad! You can now complete assignments from your teacher or coach on the iPad. We've also polished the app and fixed a few small issues.

Want to learn more about using Khan Academy assignments in your classroom? Check out khanacademy.org/resources
iOS 11 bug fixes and performance improvements.

Save time as you prep for a test or catch up in class. When you take a quiz or unit test, you'll get personalized recommendations on what to study next. Quizzes and unit tests are currently available in math and science, and we'll be adding more soon!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Khan Academy has a new logo, which means we’ve also got a shiny new app icon! There are a many new features we’re working on for back-to-school — we’ll have those updates rolling out soon!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

This is the last release that will support iOS 10, and thus the last version that will run on 32-bit devices such as the iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, and fourth-generation iPad. To continue receiving Khan Academy updates, please upgrade to iOS 11.1 or later.

- Introducing support for European Portuguese!
- Better progress tracking of mastery goals and assignments (for coached learners).
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Introducing support for Bulgarian!
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Introducing support for German!
- Introducing support for Polish!
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- If your teacher has assigned some Course Mastery, it's now available in the app!
- Bug fixes and performance improvements!

Introducing Mastery, Khan Academy’s new self-paced learning system!

Like a great tutor, the mastery learning system pinpoints your strengths and weaknesses, recommends exercises based on your individual needs, and provides instant hints and feedback. So, you’ll always know what’s up next and how to get unstuck—plus you won’t waste time on stuff you already know.

- If your teacher has assigned some Course Mastery, it's now available in the app!
- Bug fixes and performance improvements!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

This update includes a lot of improvements, just for you!
- We've completely redesigned the main screen of the app, to highlight your assignments and to give you quick access to the courses you've selected on our website.
- Bookmarks and downloads have a fresh design, and now you can download HD versions of videos!
- We've got a brand-new video player for phones and tablets.
- Under the hood, we've rebuilt much of our infrastructure—which is a fancy way of saying that the app now takes up much less space on your device.
- We've added support for Indonesia, and more languages are coming soon.

Take a look around, and let us know what you think by leaving a review!
